properties.name: media_limit.club.amount
properties.description: Maximum everyday media amount a club can upload everyday.

properties.name: media_limit.club.max_size
properties.description: Media max size in bytes a club is allowed to upload.

properties.name: media_limit.user.amount
properties.description: Maximum everyday media amount an user can upload.

properties.name: media_limit.user.max_size
properties.description: Media max size in bytes an user is allowed to upload.

properties.name: storage.name
properties.description: Cloud handler's name, only aws or cloudinary are currently supported.

properties.name: storage.bucket
properties.description: Cloud bucket's name where all data will be stored.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret pass of the main JWT, DON'T USE DEFAULT VALUE.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-secret
properties.description: Secret pass of the refresh token, DON'T USE DEFAULT VALUE.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token-duration
properties.description: Duration of the refresh token, in seconds.

properties.name: auth.enable-root
properties.description: Allow to authenticate with the root user. It's recommended to disable it in production.

properties.name: auth.password-root
properties.description: User root's password, DO NOT USE DEFAULT VALUE.

properties.name: auth.auto-generation
properties.description: Automatically create account if LDAP's account exist but not on database.
